debug_text.text: '[GT-Batch] âš ï¸ Batch state not found for ship ' + $ship.idcode + ' (global.$GT_BatchDataList exists: ' + global.$GT_BatchDataList? + ')'
'[GT-Batch-DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') WARNING wareKeysList is NULL!'
'[GT-Batch-DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') WARNING wareKeysList is EMPTY count=0!'
'[GT-Batch-DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Processing ware #' + $wareIdx + ': ' + (if $ware? then @$ware.name else 'NULL') + ' (quota: ' + $tradesForThisWare + '/' + $maxTradesPerWare + ')'
'[GT-Batch-DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Found: ' + $sellOffersForWare.count + ' sell, ' + $buyOffersForWare.count + ' buy offers for ' + (if $ware? then @$ware.name else 'NULL')

'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ” SELL OFFER #' + $idx + ': Offer sector=' + (if $offerSectorName? then $offerSectorName else 'NULL') + ', Current sector=' + (if $currentSectorName? then $currentSectorName else 'NULL') + ', Match=' + ($offerSector == $currentSector)

'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ” BUY OFFER #' + $idx + ': Offer sector=' + (if $offerSectorName? then $offerSectorName else 'NULL') + ', Current sector=' + (if $currentSectorName? then $currentSectorName else 'NULL') + ', Match=' + ($offerSector == $currentSector)

'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ”’ ISOLATED FILTER: ' + $wareName + ' in ' + (if $currentSectorName? then $currentSectorName else 'NULL') + ' - Filtered to ' + $sellOffersForWare.count + ' sell, ' + $buyOffersForWare.count + ' buy (current sector only)'

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and @global.$GT_GlobalSettings.$Debug.$EnableDebugLogging and ($intraSectorResult.$AddedSellCount gt 0 or $intraSectorResult.$AddedBuyCount gt 0)

debug_text.text: '[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… Added intra-sector offers for ' + (if $ware? then @$ware.name else 'NULL') + ' in ' + @$currentSector.knownname + ': ' + $intraSectorResult.$AddedSellCount + ' sell, ' + $intraSectorResult.$AddedBuyCount + ' buy (beyond top ' + $maxOffersPerWareForMatching + ')'

'[GT-Batch-DEBUG] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ” SEPARATION for ' + $wareName + ' in ' + $sectorName + ': Total=' + $sellOffersForWare.count + ' sell, ' + $buyOffersForWare.count + ' buy | Intra=' + $intraSectorSellOffers.count + ' sell, ' + $intraSectorBuyOffers.count + ' buy | Cross=' + $crossSectorSellOffers.count + ' sell, ' + $crossSectorBuyOffers.count + ' buy'

'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ” Phase 1 (INTRA-SECTOR)' + $isolationLabel + ' for ' + $wareName + ' in ' + $sectorName + ': ' + $intraSectorSellOffers.count + ' sell, ' + $intraSectorBuyOffers.count + ' buy offers' + (if ($intraSectorSellOffers.count == 0 or $intraSectorBuyOffers.count == 0) then ' âš ï¸ MISSING ONE TYPE!' else '')

'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âŒ INTRA-SECTOR REJECTED (no profit): ' + $wareName + ' (Buy: ' + $buyStationName + ' @ ' + ($buyPrice/100) + ' Cr, Sell: ' + $sellStationName + ' @ ' + ($sellPrice/100) + ' Cr - sellPrice le buyPrice)'
'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âŒ INTRA-SECTOR REJECTED (docking): ' + $wareName + ' (Buy: ' + $buyStationName + ' dock=' + $dockBuy + ', Sell: ' + $sellStationName + ' dock=' + $dockSell + ')'

'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âŒ INTRA-SECTOR REJECTED (zero amount): ' + $wareName + ' (maxAmount=' + $maxAmount + ', offer=' + $offerAmount + ', buy=' + $buyAmount + ', cargo=' + $cargoCap + ', money=' + $affordable + ')'

set_value.name: $thresholdLabel
set_value.exact: if $shipIsIsolated then ' (25% threshold for ISOLATED)' else ' (50% threshold for intra-sector)'

debug_text.text: '[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âŒ INTRA-SECTOR REJECTED (profit/ROI too low)' + $thresholdLabel + ': ' + $wareName + ' (Profit: ' + ($profit/100) + ' Cr lt ' + ($profitThreshold/100) + ' Cr, ROI: ' + ($roi/1) + '% lt ' + ($roiThreshold/1) + '%)'

'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') ðŸ’° PRICE VERIFICATION for intra-sector trade:' + '
 sellOfferPrice (RAW): ' + $sellOfferPrice + ' = ' + ($sellOfferPrice/100) + ' Cr' + '
 buyOfferPrice (RAW): ' + $buyOfferPrice + ' = ' + ($buyOfferPrice/100) + ' Cr' + '
 $buyPrice (stored, RAW): ' + $buyPrice + ' = ' + ($buyPrice/100) + ' Cr' + '
 $sellPrice (stored, RAW): ' + $sellPrice + ' = ' + ($sellPrice/100) + ' Cr' + '
 Profit (RAW): ' + $profit + ' = ' + ($profit/100) + ' Cr' + '
 Calculated profit check: (' + ($sellPrice/100) + ' - ' + ($buyPrice/100) + ') * ' + $maxAmount + ' = ' + (($sellPrice - $buyPrice) * $maxAmount / 100) + ' Cr'

'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âœ… INTRA-SECTOR trade created' + $isolationLabel + ': ' + (if $sellOfferWare? then @$sellOfferWare.name else 'NULL') + ' in ' + @$currentSector.knownname + ' (Profit: ' + ($profit/100) + ' Cr, ROI: ' + ($roi/1) + '%, Score: ' + ($efficiency/1) + ')'

'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') âš ï¸ Phase 1 (INTRA-SECTOR) SKIPPED [ISOLATED]: ' + $wareName + ' in ' + $sectorName + ' - ' + $intraSectorSellOffers.count + ' sell, ' + $intraSectorBuyOffers.count + ' buy (need BOTH > 0)'
'[GT-Cache-DIAG] Trade NOT cached: Profit le 0 (Profit=' + ($profit/100) + ' Cr, ROI=' + ($roi/1) + '%)'
'[GT-Cache-DIAG] Trade NOT cached: ROI below threshold (ROI=' + ($roi/1) + '% lt Threshold=' + ($cacheThreshold/1) + '%, Profit=' + ($profit/100) + ' Cr)'

do_if.value: global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$Enabled and global.$GT_Config.$Debug.$TradeSearch and not ($sellOfferWare? and $sellOfferOwner? and $buyOfferOwner?)

debug_text.text: '[GT-Cache-DEBUG] âš Trade NOT cached (validation failed): ROI=' + ($roi/1) + '%, Profit=' + ($profit/100) + ' Cr, sellOfferWare=' + ($sellOfferWare? and 'OK' or 'NULL') + ', sellOfferOwner=' + ($sellOfferOwner? and 'OK' or 'NULL') + ', buyOfferOwner=' + ($buyOfferOwner? and 'OK' or 'NULL')
'[GT-Cache] âœ… Trade cached: ' + $sellOfferWare.name + ', ROI=' + ($roi/1) + '%, Profit=' + ($profit/100) + ' Cr, Distance=' + $routeDistance + ' jumps (cache now: ' + $cacheCount + ' entries)'
'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Complete. Total: ' + $tradeList.count + ' trades'
'[GT-Batch] (' + $ship.idcode + ') Signalled waiting cue to resume'
